name: Get Into It
description:
Get into it is game who forced player to possessed NPC to get into Bank
Because in the story the main character is dead because broke
So he want to change his life to death as rich,so he try to rob the bank in ghost mode 

BUTTON
[W][A][S][D]  : Move :v: 
[F]           : Talk/ Possessed NPC
[SPACE]       : Release NPC (possessed mode)

(REMEMBER TRY TO READ HOW TO PLAY FIRST BEFORE YOU START THE GAME)
